Name: OtaRock
Notes: An octopus enemy that attacks the player by spitting fireballs and coconuts at them. It can be defeated with a Koopa Shell, a coconut, or any attacks caused by another enemy.

Obj_arg0.Name: Always Shoots Fireballs?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, it will spit fireballs instead of coconuts.

Obj_arg1.Name: Starts With Coconut?
Obj_arg1.Description: If set, it will begin to spit a coconut instead of a fireball.

SW_A.Description: If used, it remains passive while this switch is not activated. It's intended to be placed inside a TakoBarrelA or another container when using this switch. Once activated, it will hop out and behave as usual.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

SearchTurtle.Description: Red Koopa Shells and Gold Shells home in on this object.
